name: Imouto RPG 2: Promiscuous Hazuki Adventure
description: Help Hazuki become the biggest explosion in the world! Become the best when you're the most garbage tier character in the entire universe that dies to everything. This game was hastily made for April Fools. It is a butchered version of our upcoming RPG game we'll be releasing on Steam called Hazuki Dies. If you're willing, please wait a day after April Fools for us to clean up the smaller issues as well as possible text issues in Spanish and Japanese localizations.
